channeldata.description: DeepXDE is a deep learning library on top of TensorFlow. Use DeepXDE if you need a deep learning library that solves forward and inverse partial differential equations (PDEs) via physics-informed neural network (PINN), solves forward and inverse integro-differential equations (IDEs) via PINN, solves forward and inverse fractional partial differential equations (fPDEs) via fractional PINN (fPINN), approximates functions from multi-fidelity data via multi-fidelity NN (MFNN), approximates nonlinear operators via deep operator network (DeepONet), approximates functions from a dataset with/without constraints.
channeldata.summary: Deep learning library for solving differential equations
